Title: Deadly Code
Writer: Stefano Rulli (story), Sandro Petraglia (story), Stefano Rulli (screenplay), Sandro Petraglia (screenplay), Gabriele Salvatores (screenplay), Nicolai Lilin (book)
Actors: Arnas Fedaravicius, Vilius Tumalavicius, Eleanor Tomlinson, Jonas Trukanas
Plot: A drama based on a memoir about growing up as a member of the Urka community in the small republic of Transnistria.
